title: CafePress Stainless Steel Travel Mug Stainless Steel Travel Mug, Insulated 20 oz. Coffee Tumbler
features: ULTRA-INSULATED: Our vacuum-sealed double-wall technology keeps your beverage piping hot for 6 hours or ice cold for 12 hours.
DURABLE CONSTRUCTION: Made of food grade 100% stainless steel, our tumblers are BPA-free with a scratch-proof finish, drop-resistant and effectively unbreakable.

PERFECT SIZE: Quench your thirst for hours with a full 20 ounces! Our stainless steel tumbler is 7.25" tall and 3.5" in diameter, so it easily fits car cup holders for an easy commute to work and fits under your pod-style coffee maker for a quick brew.

UNIQUE AND BUILT TO LAST: You'll love this unique design that you won't find anywhere else! Our stainless steel tumblers feature crisp images in vivid color, guaranteed to last. And the spill-resistant lid makes it perfect for any beverage - coffee, tea, cocoa, cocktails, champagne, beer, sodas, ice water, or anything else you're thirsty for!

IDEAL FOR YOURSELF & THE PERFECT GIFT: Treat yourself to this to-go mug to use for commuting, camping, tailgating, hiking, travel and more. Or gift for Mother's Day, Father's Day, Valentine's Day, Christmas, birthdays, anniversaries, retirement - or for no reason at all! Imported for final manufacture locally.
description: Keep your beverage hot on the go with our stainless steel 20oz travel mug. With many designs to choose from, you are sure to find the perfect design for your everyday communte or for your special someone. With CafePress, your satisfaction is always our promise. Buy with confidence, as we offer easy returns and exchanges.
